column1: Table 9. Prisoners held in the custody of private prisons and local jails, December 31, 2013 and 2014
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program
Table 9. Prisoners held in the custody of private prisons and local jails, December 31, 2013 and 2014
a/Includes prisoners held in the jurisdiction’s own private facilities, as well as private facilities in another state.
b/Includes federal prisoners held in nonsecure privately operated facilities (9,480), as well as prisoners on home confinement (3,473).
c/Prisons and jails form one integrated system. Data include total jail and prison populations.
d/State did not submit 2014 National Prisoner Statistics (NPS) data. See Methodology.
e/State did not submit 2013 NPS data. See Methodology.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2013–2014.
